result.execSummary:
The defendant Sterling E. Cloud was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Damage to Property, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Cover Letter from DOC to Br. 2
Cover Letter from Br. 2 to Parties

Defendant Sterling E. Cloud in court with attorney Melville Peter Middleton.  Defendant Sterling E. Cloud in custody.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Middleton states matters are resolved.  15CF115 will be a felony plea on Ct 1 so they need to do waiver of prelim and then do plea/sent...states recs.  State agrees.  Atty Middleton states DE waives prelim in 15CF115.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on prelim waiver/accepts/finds probable cause and binds over.  Atty Middleton acknowledges rec. information/waives reading.  NC pleas entered to Ct 1 in both cases.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on pleas/accepts/finds guilty.  Parties review VIS.  Court sentences.

15CF115
Ct 1:  NC
Cts 2,3 and 4:  Dismissed/read-in

15CF174
Ct 1:  NC
Cts 2 and 3:  Dismissed/read-in

24 months probation on each concurrent to each other
Conditions of probation:
15CF115 only - 60 days jail w/huber consecutive to any other sentence w/o good time to commence forthwith
Costs of $518.00 in 15CF115 to be paid per agent
Costs of $443.00 in 15CF174 to e paid per agent
Treatment/AODA/Counseling/Evaluations per agent
Restitution in 15CF174 - (stip filed) to be paid per agent
DNA sample to be provided in 15CF115 unless one has previously been provided
No contact w/Econo Lodge in Wisconsin Dells
Any jail credit to be determined by written stipulation

Return date at 06-10-2015 01:00 pm.
Pre-trial conference at 05-29-2015 10:15 am.

Defendant Sterling E. Cloud by video from LEC with attorney Puck Tsai.  Defendant Sterling E. Cloud in custody.  Linda A. Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  State requests $1,000 cash bond.  Atty Tsai responds/requests lesser cash bond.  Advised rights to an attorney.  Requests Preliminary hearing; Time limits waived.  $500.00 cash bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 29, 2015 at 10:15 am.  Return date scheduled for June 10, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
